plot outline: Vijay (Jai) an IT professional happens to share an coach with Jenny (Vaibhavi Shandilya) and the duo strike a conversation and soon are sharing beers and the bed too. After two years they meet and recognize each other and for some inexplicable reason decide to get married. Vijay's colleague Varsha (Athulya Ravi) is ogling at him for years and for some inexplicable reason again she never explicitly say it out to him though she shows it in every possible way. Problem is Varsha continues to pine for Vijay and she gets a chance one night when he drops her home and she beds him using a few beers. A pregnant Varsha then forces her way into the young couple's house.
title: Capmaari
